No. 1166,

Misc.

Weems v. Follette, Warden. Louis L. Hoynes, Jr., for petitioner. Louis J. Lefkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Samuel A. Hirshowitz, First Assistant Attorney General, and Hillel Hoffman, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.
